item.title: Walking the rightsizing walk. Here's why I decided to sell the house
item.description: I should know by now, if you venture into an exploratory hypothetical conversation with a real estate broker, you might as well start packing. One casual conversation with a broker friend started the house hurricane.

item.title: 'Bachelor in Paradise' week 7: How to watch, who got dumped last week
item.description: "Bachelor in Paradise"is back after a year-long hiatus, followingformer Bachelor Nation contestantsas they attempt a second (or third, or fourth) chance at finding their soulmate on national television.

item.title: Tropical Storm Erin expected to become hurricane. Here's…
item.description: Tropical Storm Erinis expected to begin strengthening soon and is likely to become a hurricane in the next 48 hours, according to the latest advisory from theNational Hurricane Center.

item.title: School board member named new leader at Project Pride SRQ
item.description: Sarasota County School Board member Tom Edwards is stepping into a new spotlight as the next executive director of Project Pride SRQ, a nonprofit that champions LGBTQ+ inclusion and celebrates diversity through high-profile events, community programs and year-round advocacy.
